attributes.additional_details: Its Time to reconsider the legalisation of Cannabis, the dangers associated with the use of cannabis , are a direct result of its prohabition, People will use Cannabis , even if it is illegal, so by legalising personal possesion and use of Cannabis this country will free up the police, and courts, and gain some much needed revenue , it will also take this product from the hands of criminals, and ensure that it can be regulated, and controlled
